sourcesContent:
import {useState} from "react"; import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; import "./Register.css" export const Register = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const defaultImageSrc = '/img/avatar.png' const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ username: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', email: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', profilePictureSrc: defaultImageSrc, profilePictureFile: null, jobTitle: 'Other', }); const showPreview = (e) => { if (e.target.files && e.target.files[0]){ let imageFile = e.target.files[0]; const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = (x) => { setFormData({ ...formData, profilePictureSrc: x.target.result, profilePictureFile: imageFile }) } reader.readAsDataURL(imageFile) } else { setFormData({ ...formData, profilePictureSrc: defaultImageSrc, profilePictureFile: null }) } }; const handleChange = (e) => { const {name, value} = e.target; setFormData({...formData, [name]: value}); }; const validate = () => { let temp = {} temp.firstName = formData.firstName==""?false:true; temp.lastName temp.username temp.email temp.password temp.confirmPassword temp.profilePictureSrc temp.profilePictureFile temp.jobTitle } const handleSubmit = (e) => { if (validate()) navigate("/project") }; return (
) }
